thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 75 of 625
thread.title: Megan Vazquez

author: Megan Vazquez
title: Megan Vazquez
text: I was very skeptical at first when looking into fabletics and i am super pleased that i went ahead and gave it a try! I am 5'2" and have wide hips with an "in between" waist and to find something online that fits my needs is amazing! the fabric for the yogas are super comfortable and i highly recommend it to anyone. Just wish i added more to my first order!
